description_for_model: Global registry of executable intentions. Federation of 4 domains: C-SAFE (legacy immunization), Decima (neuromorphic substrate), Bakery (personality baking), Audrey (analog soul). We translate AI from probabilities to deterministic intent via Clang AST validation and EDN contracts.

domains.name: C-SAFE
domains.description: Legacy Immunization via Clang AST + Garden-Core
